c:atomType.name: LegendOverflow
c:atomType.c:documentation: Use these possible strategies when the number of legend items exceeds the or overflows the legend panel dimensions.

c:atom.name: Collapse
c:atom.c:documentation: When overflow is detected, the whole legend panel is collapsed and the legend is not displayed.

c:atom.name: Clip
c:atom.c:documentation:
All legend items are rendered but the overflow in the legend panel is hidden.
This option does not affect the case when the number of legend items exceeds .
No overflow indicator is shown.
